MultiFeature.Name: Corrosive Metabolism
MultiFeature.Text: Your control over your body allows you to deliver acid or poison attacks.

Feature.Name: Corrosive Metabolism - Psychic Focus
Feature.Text: While focused on this discipline, you have resistance to acid and poison damage.

Feature.Name: Corrosive Metabolism - Corrosive Touch (1–7 psi)
Feature.Text: As an action, you deliver a touch of acid to one creature within your reach. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking 1d10 acid damage per psi point spent on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Feature.Name: Corrosive Metabolism - Venom Strike (1–7 psi)
Feature.Text: As an action, you create a poison spray that targets one creature you can see within 30 feet of you. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, it takes 1d6 poison damage per psi point spent and is poisoned until the end of your next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn’t poisoned.

Feature.Name: Corrosive Metabolism - Acid Spray (2 psi)
Feature.Text: As a reaction when you take piercing or slashing damage, you cause acid to spray from your wound; each creature within 5 feet of you takes 2d6 acid damage.

Feature.Name: Corrosive Metabolism - Breath of the Black Dragon (5 psi)
Feature.Text: You exhale a wave of acid in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a Constitution saving throw, taking 6d6 acid damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. You can increase the damage by 1d6 per additional psi point spent on it.

Feature.Name: Corrosive Metabolism - Breath of the Green Dragon (7 psi)
Feature.Text: You exhale a cloud of poison in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in the line must make a Constitution saving throw, taking 10d6 poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
